name: Frank
dialogue: Hey, I just ran a marathon yesterday! Can you believe it?

name: Alice
dialogue: Wow, that's impressive, Frank! You never cease to amaze me.

name: David
dialogue: I wish I had your discipline and energy, man.

name: Cathy
dialogue: Yeah, seriously. Maybe then I could finish my novel.

name: Frank
dialogue: Speaking of novels, David, have you made any progress on yours?

name: David
dialogue: Actually, I just finished the first draft last night!

name: Frank
dialogue: Seriously, that's a huge accomplishment. Well done.

name: Cathy
dialogue: So, what's your novel about? Can you give us a sneak peek?

name: David
dialogue: Sure, it's a sci-fi story about a world where people can upload their consciousness to the cloud.

name: Alice
dialogue: That sounds fascinating! I can't wait to read it.

name: Frank
dialogue: Yeah, I'm intrigued too. When can we expect to see it on bookstore shelves?

name: David
dialogue: Ha ha, well, it's going to take some time to edit and revise, but hopefully soon!

name: Cathy
dialogue: In the meantime, maybe you could read us a passage or two.

name: Frank
dialogue: Yeah, come on, David. Give us a taste of your writing.

name: David
dialogue: Alright, alright. Let me find a good passage...
